member.name: T:Kamilla.Network.Protocols.Wow.Races
member.summary:
Represents playable and not playable races of World of Warcraft.
When using localized names of this enum, pass gender as the first argument.

member.name: F:Kamilla.Network.Protocols.Wow.Races.Human
member.summary: Represents the Human race. This race belongs to Alliance. This race is playable.
